original_title: The life is a casting (La vita è un provino)
overview: The life is a casting is a  film, that tells the story of an actor who has a business appointment, a casting, it looks like a normal day for this clumsy actor but it will come as a surprise. Stefano Simondo is himself in this comedy for all ages.
tagline: The life is casting for Stefano
title: The life is a casting (La vita è un provino)
